text:
e="preserve">Lee Roy West (November 26, 1929 – April 24, 2020) was an American politician and lawyer. He was the Senior United States District Judge of the United States District Court for the Western District of Oklahoma. He was nominated to the court by President Jimmy Carter in 1979. West was born in Clayton, Oklahoma.
West died on April 24, 2020 in Muskogee, Oklahoma at the age of 90.

annotations.surface_form: United States District Court for the Western District of Oklahoma
